attributes.additional_details: Hence we will not lose e.g. Lord Sugar's expertise on matters commercial nor Same Tanni Grey-Thompson's on matters affecting the disabled.
attributes.background: Their Lordship's daily attendance allowance should be abolished immediately. They should only attend to participate in debates for the service of the country they love.

rejection.details:
The matter of the attendance allowance for members of the House of Lords is a matter for the House of Lords alone, and not something that the UK Government or Parliament as a whole. 

You could find out more about your options for pressing for action on this by contacting the House of Lords enquiry service at hlinfo@parliament.uk
